resources.string: ICONex enables users to create and manage wallets for various cryptocurrencies that are connected to ICON Network including ICX and ETH.
Convenient storage and transfer of ICX and other various cryptocurrencies connected with ICON are possible based on the Reserved Balance.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
Select a wallet between ICX wallet and ETH wallet.
You can add ERC20 tokens from the Ethereum wallet menu.
Which coin would you like to add?
You are responsible for keeping your password safe. DO NOT FORGET TO SAVE THIS. If you lose your password, you cannot restore it.
You will need the password to load your wallet in other devices using the Keystore file or your private key.
Enter a wallet name and a password.
At least 8 characters including letters, numbers, and special characters.
Password must contain a combination of letters, numbers, and special characters. ( ? ! : . , % + - / * < > { } ( ) [ ] ` ” ‘ ~ _ ^ \ | @ # $ & )
This Keystore file contains the encrypted private key\nrequires the wallet password to access it.
Use this Keystore file to load your wallet from other devices.
You can download your Keystore file from the \"Backup wallet\" menu later.
DO NOT SHARE YOUR KEYSTORE FILE WITH OTHERS. Do you want to proceed?
Do you want to proceed without downloading the Keystore file?
The private key is unique to your wallet \nprivate key has no password.
Pay special attention to your private key as anyone who can access to the private key can transfer assets from the wallets without your permission.
You can access to your private key from the \'Backup wallet\' menu later.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
How would you like to add your wallet?
Select your Keystore file and enter your password.
If your Keystore file is stored on another device, move the Keystore file to this device or upload it to cloud service and then select the Keystore file.
Please enter a new wallet name
Incorrect private key. Please check again.
Select a coin and enter your private key
Please be sure to enter the correct private key for the matching coin type.
If you load a wallet bundle, the wallets that are already registered in your wallet will not be loaded.\nDo you want to proceed?
The password of each wallet is the same as the wallet bundle password.
out of %d are already registered in your ICONex
Wallet bundle is loaded. The password of each wallet is the same as the wallet bundle password and it can be changed from wallet menu.
Please enter the new wallet name and the password.
You are responsible for keeping your password safe. DO NOT FORGET TO SAVE THIS. If you lose your password, you cannot restore it.
You will need the password to load your wallet in other devices using the Keystore file or your private key.
Password must contain at least 8 characters.
Password must contain a combination of letters, numbers, and special characters. ( ? ! : . , % + - / * < > { } ( ) [ ] ` ” ‘ ~ _ ^ \\ | @ # $ & )
Password must not have more than 2 consecutive identical characters.
Passwords do not match. Please check again.
The total asset is based on Coinmarket cap and the tokens that have no USD-converted prices will not be included.
At the time of downloading and using the official ICX wallet,\"ICONex\", the below disclaimer will be applied to the users.

1. The private key ICONex user creates in the process of using the ICONex service is stored in your device, ICON Foundation does not store or/and manage the user's private key. The ICONex user is solely responsible for safekeeping and managing the private key created. In the case of the ICONex user not being able to use the private key due to computer virus, hacking activities, theft/loss, etc., ICON Foundation is not responsible for any loss.

2. ICON Foundation does not guarantee the integrity, stability, accuracy and security of ICONex, but only provides the current version of ICONex “AS IS”. ICON Foundation is continuously running tests and making updates to provide a more stable and convenient service, however despite these efforts there is always the possibility of unexpected problems. ICON Foundation is not responsible for any unexpected problems, such as malfunction, hacking, loss and computer virus. 

3. ICON Foundation is not responsible for not being able to provide services due to natural disasters or any other force majeure.

4. ICON Foundation is not responsible for any third-party transactions the ICONex user makes using ICONex as an intermediary.

5. ICON Foundation is not responsible for any indirect, consequential, specific, punitive or any similar damages even though if ICONex is related with any torts, contract, guarantee, liability without fault and carelessness.

6. ICONex supports Korean and English as the official languages. ICON Foundation is not responsible for any loss that comes from mis-translation into other languages than the official languages.

※ All copyrights regarding ICONex is held by ICON Foundation.
ICX transfer transactions not proceeded will be cancelled automatically, restoring any transfer amount and transaction fees.
Enter the token info if it is not on the list.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
Are you sure you want to cancel?
Unable to bring the token information.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
You have 0 balance.\nPlease deposit and transfer.
Sending and receiving address are the same.
Insufficient ICX balance for transaction fee
You have insufficient ETH balance for GAS.
Please check the amount and the receiving address once again.

Step limit is the amount of step to send with your transaction. Unnecessary step is refunded to you at the end of transaction. In other words, you can set the maximum amount of step but the actual step consumption is not fixed.

Step price is the amount you pay per unit of step.\nStep price is paid in loop and 1 loop is fixed to 0.000000000000000001(10−18) ICX. ICON transaction fee is imposed according to various factors such as the number of smart contract usage, the amount of blockchain database used and the size of transaction data, etc.
Estimated Maximum Fee = Step price * Step limit
You may enter data to send with the transaction. Transaction fee is imposed according to the size of data.

Gas limit is the amount of gas to send with your transaction.\nUnnecessary gas is refunded to you at the end of transaction. In other words, you can set the maximum amount of gas but the actual gas consumption is not fixed.

Gas price is an unit of gas.\n1 Gwei equals 0.000000001 ETH.\nEthereum miners prioritize based on gas price when generating blocks. If you set higher gas price, you have more chance to get your transaction confirmed. It also determines your transaction speed.

Estimated Maximum Fee
= Gas Price * Gas Limit
Set proper gas limit and gas price.
You will pay transaction fees even if your transaction is not confirmed by miners.
If you do not enter the data when required, the transaction will fail. You will still have to pay the transaction fees. You don\'t have to enter data if it is not required in the transaction.
Are you sure you want to delete data?
Insufficient ICX balance for transaction fee
Insufficient ETH balance for transaction fee
Would you like to remove the address you have selected?
You can load your wallet using the Keystore file or your private key. Please backup your Keystore file or your private key.
The Keystore file contains the encrypted private key and requires the wallet password to access it.
Use this Keystore file to load your wallet from other devices.
The private key is unique to your wallet and has no password.
Pay special attention to your private key as anyone who can access to the private key can transfer assets from the wallets without your permission.
You are responsible for keeping your password safe. DO NOT FORGET TO SAVE THIS. If you lose your password, you cannot restore it.
You will need the password to load your wallet in other devices using the Keystore file or your private key.
Select the wallets to bundle. Passwords are required.
Wallet bundle backs up your wallets in one file. You can easily manage different wallets at once.
You will need the password to load your wallet in other devices using the Keystore file or your private key.
Please create the password for the wallet bundle and download the backup file.
You are responsible for keeping your password safe. DO NOT FORGET TO SAVE THIS. If you lose your password, you cannot restore it.
The Keystore file contains the encrypted private key and requires the wallet password to access it.
If you back up your wallets using the ‘Wallet bundle’ function, the password of each wallet will be changed into\nthe wallet bundle password.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
Place your finger on the sensor\nto unlock the screen
You can reset your passcode using your wallet password.
Please put your finger on fingerprint sensor.
Unable to recognize your fingerprint.\nPlease try again.
Do you want to activate the screen lock function?

By activating the screen lock function, a 6-digit passcode is required every time you open an ICONex app.\nIf you forget your screen lock passcode, you can reset the passcode using your wallet password.
Do you want to unlock ICONex with your fingerprint?
You can have fast access to ICONex using your fingerprint.\n\You can unlock ICONex with every fingerprint registered on your mobile phone. Please make sure you have registered your own fingerprint.
You can have fast access to ICONex using your fingerprint.
You can unlock ICONex with every fingerprint registered on your mobile phone. Please make sure you have registered your own fingerprint.
Unlock with fingerprint is disabled. Do you want to enable the function?
Please set screen lock from the Settings menu to use \"Unlock with fingerprint\" function.
Unable to identify your fingerprint. Please try again after registering on mobile settings.
Passcodes do not match\nPlease check again
The fingerprint registered on your mobile does not match and has been disabled. Please unlock the screen with your passcode to check availability.
Fingerprint scan is currently locked. You can reactivate the fingerprint scan by entering your mobile
Are you sure you want to remove your wallet?
You still have balance in your wallet. If you do not backup this wallet, you may not be able to restore your balance.\nAre you sure you want to delete?
Please update to the latest version of ICONex.

If storage is not authorized, wallet
backup file cannot be downloaded.
(Storage can be authorized
via App settings.)
If camera is not authorized, QR code scan function cannot be activated.\n(Camera can be authorized\nvia App settings.)
Pay special attention to your private key as anyone who can access to the private key can transfer assets from the wallets without your permission.
Check your mobile data or Wi-Fi and try again
Read QR codes of wallet addresses or private keys.
Store and restore Keystore files of your wallets.
If you deny these permissions, you may no longer use some features of your device.
You can change these access permission in \"Setting\" > \"App permissions\"
Cancel select wallet?\nYou will return to previous app.
Cancel enter password?\nYou will return to previous app.
Cancel Transfer?\nYou will return to previous app.
Transfer Request Complete.\nYou can check the transaction history on ICON Tracker Go to ICON Tracker.
암호화폐의 환율은 변동이 심하므로,\n최소환전비율 설정을 통해 자산을 보호하세요.
실제 환전이 체결되는 시점에 최소 환전 비율\n미만으로 받게 되면 Transaction이 취소되고,\n이미 사용한 수수료는 소진됩니다.
Unstake 취소 시 Transaction 수수료를 지불해야 합니다.
· You can add IRC tokens using ICON wallet menu.
· You can add ERC20 tokens using Ethereum wallet menu.
· Wallets for other coins will be added later.
DO NOT FORGET TO SAVE THIS.\nIf yo lose your password, you cannot restore it.
· You will need the password to load your wallet in other devices using the Keystore file or your private key.
· Use this Keystore file to load your wallet from other device.
· You can download your Keystore file from the \`Backup wallet\` menu later.
Stake되어 있는 수량 중, 이미 투표에 사용된 수량은 Unstake 할 수 없습니다.
Unstaked 최소 수량은 3 ICX 입니다. 최소 수량이 확보되어야 추후 Voting 등의 수수료를 지불할 수 있습니다.
P-Reps 탭에서 투표할 리스트 선택후,\nVoting Power를 분배해 주세요.
Voting Power를 사용한 ICX는 언제든지 돌려받을 수 있으며,\nNetworkd 발전 기여에 대한 보상으로 I-Scaore를 지급해 드립니다.
Stake 또는 Unstake 실행을\n하려면 5 ICX 이상 잔액이\n있어야 합니다.
Voting Power가 없습니다.\nICX를 Stake하면 1:1 비율로\nVoting Power가 생성됩니다.
이미 투표가 반영된 P-Rep은 삭제가 불가능합니다.\nVoting Power를 0으로 설정 후, Vote 버튼을 누르세요.
USD 환산금액이 표시되지 않은 토큰은 전체 자산 평가금액에서 제외됩니다.
원하는 수량 만큼 ICX를 잠금 상태로 전환하는 기능입니다.
Stake를 실행하면, Voting Power가 1:1 비율로 생성됩니다.
Voting Power를 이용하여 P-Rep 후보자에게 투표할 수 있습니다.
후보자가 P-Rep으로 선출되면 위임한 지분의 X.XX %에 대한 보상을 I-Score로 받을 수 있습니다.
P-Rep 투표에 대한 기여도 점수이며, 1,000 I-Score를 1 ICX로 환급 받을 수 있습니다.
